dcterms:creator: J. Torres-Sospedra
M. Aernouts
R. Berkvens
K. Van Vlaenderen
M. Weyn
dcterms:description: A multi-building and multi-floor database for WLAN fingerprint-based indoor localization problems, containing 933 distinct reference points and 21,049 sampled points collected from various mobile devices.
dcterms:title: UJIIndoorLoc

dcterms:creator: M. Aernouts
R. Berkvens
K. Van Vlaenderen
M. Weyn
dcterms:description: A dataset for fingerprint localization in large urban and rural areas, containing 130,429 messages with RSSI signal strength data from 72 gateways and GPS-based ground truth locations.
dcterms:title: Sigfox and LoRaWAN Datasets
